code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileList=()=>{const[profiles,setProfiles]=useState([]);const[nome,setNome]=useState('');const[endereco,setEndereco]=useState('');const[telefone,setTelefone]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchProfiles();},[]);const fetchProfiles=()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:5041/api/profiles').then(response=>{setProfiles(response.data.profiles);}).catch(error=>{console.error('There was an error fetching the profiles!',error);});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const newProfile={nome,endereco,telefone};axios.post('http://localhost:5041/api/profiles',newProfile).then(response=>{setProfiles([...profiles,response.data]);setNome('');setEndereco('');setTelefone('');}).catch(error=>{console.error('There was an error submitting the profile!',error);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Profiles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"nome",children:"Nome:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"nome",value:nome,onChange:e=>setNome(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"endereco",children:"Endereco:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"endereco",value:endereco,onChange:e=>setEndereco(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"telefone",children:"Telefone:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"telefone",value:telefone,onChange:e=>setTelefone(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:profiles.map(profile=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[profile.nome," - ",profile.endereco," - ",profile.telefone]},profile.id))})]});};export default ProfileList;
